Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Skokie. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
